data.caption: Clarification sought from Suzlon Energy Ltd
data.news_body:
The Exchange has sought clarification from Suzlon Energy Ltd with reference to the media report appearing on https://www.business-standard.com/companies/news/tata-power-suzlon-rs-6000-cr-andhra-pradesh-wind-project-125081201578_1.html (Source: https:// www.business-standard.com) dated August 12 2025 titled "Tata Power Suzlon sign 6000 cr deal for 700 MW wind project in Andhra".

The Company is requested to submit its clarification to the Exchange in terms of the provisions of Regulation 30 of the SEBI (LODR) Regulations 2015.
